title: Toyota to set up manufacturing plant in Maharashtra; likely to invest Rs 20,000 cr
description: Toyota Kirloskar Motor will invest around Rs 20,000 crore to set up a new manufacturing plant in Maharashtra. The company signed an MoU with the state government to explore a greenfield facility at Chhatrapati Sambhaji Nagar. This expansion is expected to boost job creation and economic growth in the region.
